data.text:
Manufacturer: Richard Ginori

User: Sitmar Cruises (Societa Italiana Trasporti Maritimi)

Date of plate: 1970s – 1980s

{"animation_fancy":"zoom-in-out","transition_fancy":"fade","fancy_box_loop":"true"}

Notes: Founded by Alexandre Vlasov, the Sitmar (Societa Italiana Trasporti Maritimi) Line was in operation from 1938-1988. Click here to read more about the history of the Sitmar Line. In 1988, the line was sold to the Peninsular & Oriental Steam Navigation Company (P&O), which assigned all of the Sitmar ships, excluding the Fairstar, to its Princess Cruises.

White body with light and dark blue Sitmar logo topmark and light blue fence post line border decoration.

For related info:

Sitmar Cruises Fairwind also by Richard Ginori

ID and photos contributed by matthanne1
